benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/tags - Add tags to account

covered: Valid Payload / Successful creation scenarios (TC01, TC02)
Validation of required headers and error handling for missing header (TC11)
Non-existent or invalid account scenarios (TC12, TC13, TC14)
Regression - special characters in tag definitions (TC23)
Backward compatibility with previous API version (TC24)
gaps: Authorization coverage could be broader: specifically tests for explicitly forbidden access (e.g., incorrect/expired token leading to 403 or 401 variations beyond missing token)
recommendations: Add explicit test for forbidden/expired token resulting in 403 or 401 regardless of token presence (beyond TC15).
Add tests validating caching behavior headers (ETag, Cache-Control) for the POST endpoint as per guidelines.
Add rate limiting/throttling tests to verify behavior under bursts of requests.
Clarify pagination behavior with large datasets beyond ignoring parameters (e.g., verify how created tags list is returned when extremely large payloads or many created items).
